name: I Know You!
description: Let's get personal! Describe the person on the card without using any other people, places, genders, or appearance. No pointing!

name: Act It Out
description: It's time to mime! Act out the action on the card for your teammate to guess. No talking!

name: Superstars
description: They're all here, the biggest pop culture celebrities! Help your teammate guess as manay starts as you can without saying any part of the name on the card, and withour rhyming!

name: just for kids
description: Whether you're a kid, or just a kid at heart, this is the deck for you! Help your teammate guess the word on the card without saying what it is!

name: animals gone wild
description: Get your teammate to guess the animal on the card without saying any part of the animal name on the card, and without rhyming!

name: accents & impressions
description: Do your best accents and impressions to help your teammate figure out the accent or person on the card, without saying anything on the card, and without rhyming!

name: Famous Families
description: This is a deck fulll of famous families from film and television and beyond! Get your teammate to guess these iconic families without saying any part of the name on the card, and without rhyming!

name: Hum It
description: Get your teammate(s) to guess the song on the card without using any lyrics, only humming! For an extra challenge: try just whistling.
